summary: This document is an email chain from August 24, 2020, regarding scheduling a telephone call with a Victim/Witness Coordinator about Epstein victims. The call is to be led by the Associate Deputy Attorney General & National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking at the U.S. Department of Justice, and appears to be related to an OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) meeting to announce investigation results.

persons.name: Associate Deputy Attorney General & National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking
persons.role: Associate Deputy Attorney General & National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking
persons.context: The DOJ official who is scheduling a telephone call with a Victim/Witness Coordinator regarding Epstein victims.

events.title: Scheduled Telephone Call on Epstein Victims
events.description: A telephone call is scheduled from 3:30-4:30 p.m. between the Associate Deputy Attorney General & National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking, other DOJ officials, and a Victim/Witness Coordinator to discuss Epstein victims.
personsInvolved: Associate Deputy Attorney General & National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking

events.title: OPR Meeting Announcement
events.description: Reference to an OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) meeting to announce the results of their investigation, likely related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The U.S. Department of Justice was actively coordinating with a Victim/Witness Coordinator regarding Epstein victims as of August 2020.
A high-level DOJ official, the Associate Deputy Attorney General & National Coordinator for Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking, was directly involved in scheduling a call about the victims.
The communication references an OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) meeting to announce investigation results, indicating ongoing internal DOJ reviews related to the Epstein case.
The email chain shows internal DOJ coordination and forwarding of information about 'Epstein Victims' among officials.
